name: LD47 - The Pongs
description:
Poor Pongs… they have been bouncing around computer screens for decades. Help them get a break by nudging them out of the vortex loop.

A/D or Left/Right arrow keys moves your motivational coaxing device.

Space bar sends a nudge.

The game allows you to choose the number of Pongs and the vortex speed.

Yes, it’s all here!

  • The blips and bloops of days gone by.
  • The incredibly annoying chiptune music.
  • Some other third thing!
